key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and litigation risks due to operating in a highly regulated environment

controversies: Lawsuit involving former employee Donald J. Painter highlighting contractual and employment disputes
social_issues: Ethical challenges in high-profile litigation and regulatory cases, including potential conflicts of interest
governance_issues: Potential reputational risks from regulatory and litigation exposure
